item.title: CVE-2023-29064|2024-10-11T17:57:54.519Z -- becton%2C%20dickinson%20and%20company%20%28bd%29 -- facschorus
item.description: The FACSChorus software contains sensitive information stored in plaintext. A threat actor could gain hardcoded secrets used by the application, which include tokens and passwords for administrative accounts.
